data.name: StudioS Fighters: Climax Champions
data.detailed_description:
Overview

An entire generation of StudioS characters all fighting to be #1!

Fight your way to the top with satisfying and easy to execute combos!
A unique retro-style game inspired by 90s era handheld fighting games!

Character Roster


Strip Fighter: Yuki, Mari, Archincubus
BATTLE SLAVE: Saya, S
Hunter's Edge: Seria
Galaxy Gunners: Mika
Acme Iku: Iku Acme
MONMUSU＊FIGHT: Mayreau
Slave Princess Sarah: Sarah

Tag-Team system keeps the action rolling!

Call support characters into a fight and carry out double team attacks!

Time your tag-ins just right...and turn the battle in your favor!!

Features

  • Easy to pick simple fighting game controlls.
  • Tag-Team fighting made up of 10 teams of 20 fun and unique characters.
  • A plethora of comical and outrageous attack animations
  • Story Mode where you can play against CPU
  • Versus Mode that allows you to play as any character
  • Practice Mode you can use to hone your skills

DirectPlay must be installed in order to play this game

DirectPlay is required to play this game.

If DirectPlay is not installed on your computer, you will be prompted to install it when the game is launched for the first time.

If you cancel the DirectPlay installation or if it does not install correctly, please follow the below steps to activate it:
1. Press Windows Key + R.
2.Type "appwiz.cpl" in the text box and press enter.
3. Click on "Turn Windows features on or off".
4. Check "Legacy Components >DirectPlay.

data.short_description: An entire generation of StudioS characters all fighting to be #1! Fight your way to the top with satisfying and easy to execute combos! A unique retro-style game inspired by 90s era handheld fighting games!
data.supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium3 1GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip
  • Additional Notes: Using gamepad is highly recommended. Low latency broadband is required for multiplayer.

content_descriptors.notes: - Depiction of characters with a lot of exposed skin or underwear
